changelog.change: Improved GameTime accuracy during fading loading screens and run Starts.
Improved load removal by detecting end-level cutscene loads (freeze frames), common on HDDs.
Added Settings screen warning when the LS Layout is missing a Game Time timer (Timer or DetailedTimer).
Added Settings link to SRcom LS guide.
Improved support for Achievements runs: Split when runner exits Lara's Home using passport.
Improved run tracking to support Lara's Home splits; prevent re-splits from the same Lara's Home during a run.
Hotfix for broken Start and version string.
Removed false start when LiveSplit was opened while a game was in the first level.
Deathrun improvement when more than 1 split exists: stopped IGT when Lara is dead.
Deathrun improvement: when Enable Auto-Reset is active, a reset is triggered when using the passport from the death menu.
Improved Game Version text when no game is running, an unknown version is running, and an unsupported version is running.
Added a warning label when a Scriptable Auto Splitter is present in the LiveSplit layout to help prevent undefined behavior.
Fixed double-split issue in Natla's Mines due to an in-game cutscene after the stats screen.
Hotfix for GameTime initialization causing GameTime splits to sometimes not display.
Initial release. FG, IL / Section, and Deathrun support with automatic Start, Split, and optional Reset. Supports LiveSplit's Undo Split.
